amendment.description: To repeal the requirement for the reduction of certain Survivor Benefit Plan annuities by the amount of dependency and indemnity compensation and to modify the effective date for paid-up coverage under the Survivor Benefit Plan.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 762 withdrawn in Senate.
Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.

Amendment SA 762 proposed by Senator Nelson FL. (consideration: CR S8813-8815; text: CR S8813-8814) To repeal the requirement for the reduction of certain Survivor Benefit Plan annuities by the amount of dependency and indemnity compensation and to modify the effective date for paid-up coverage under the Survivor Benefit Plan.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 762 proposed by Senator Nelson FL.
